医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
研究表明数百万美国人获得肺康复的机会有限耶鲁大学领导的一项新研究显示，肺康复是慢性呼吸系统疾病患者护理的重要组成部分，但对数百万美国人来说却很难获得。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Study-reveals-limited-access-to-pulmonary-rehabilitation-for-millions-of-Americans.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Study-reveals-limited-access-to-pulmonary-rehabilitation-for-millions-of-Americans.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=0d81e638-54db-44b7-bbe9-8b0f588aa5ed Tue, 06 Feb 2024 14:35:26 -0500 Study reveals limited access to pulmonary rehabilitation for millions of Americans
在 COVID-19 时代，美国成年人面临痛苦和不平等的心理保健服务根据哥伦比亚大学梅尔曼公共卫生学院和哥伦比亚大学欧文医学中心的一项研究，由于 COVID-19 大流行，美国成年人经历了相当大的心理困扰和不良心理健康影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/US-adults-face-distress-unequal-mental-health-care-access-during-the-COVID-19-era.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/US-adults-face-distress-unequal-mental-health-care-access-during-the-COVID-19-era.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f852141b-aeed-4a36-8324-5bb7b0ee49de Tue, 06 Feb 2024 14:27:00 -0500 U.S. adults face distress, unequal mental health care access during the COVID-19 era
揭开痘病毒核心的架构最近 Mpox 的重新出现和爆发使痘病毒再次成为公共卫生威胁，凸显了其核心的重要知识差距。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Unraveling-the-architecture-of-poxvirus-cores.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Unraveling-the-architecture-of-poxvirus-cores.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ebfc19ce-c711-4285-9a6f-ce99903f89a1 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 14:18:07 -0500 Unraveling the architecture of poxvirus cores
探索上肢测试评估心肺功能对于下肢受伤或残疾而无法骑自行车的人，如何在心肺运动测试中实现包容性？ https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Exploring-upper-limb-tests-for-cardiopulmonary-function-assessment.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Exploring-upper-limb-tests-for-cardiopulmonary-function-assessment.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=a40776a4-28cc-497a-9a32-8c0ee77408c6 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 14:12:38 -0500 Exploring upper-limb tests for cardiopulmonary function assessment
研究表明，从长远来看，跑步有助于防止体重或脂肪增加最近，一些媒体强调，跑步可以帮助你减肥/减脂，这是一个神话。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Running-helps-to-prevent-weight-or-fat-gain-in-the-long-term-study-shows.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Running-helps-to-prevent-weight-or-fat-gain-in-the-long-term-study-shows.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f0485208-2fa6-4c46-9b7e-086af1e2557b Tue, 06 Feb 2024 13:38:04 -0500 Running helps to prevent weight or fat gain in the long-term, study shows
新指南为缓解牙齿疼痛制定了更安全的标准根据美国牙科协会制定的一项新的临床实践指南，建议单独服用非甾体抗炎药 (NSAID) 或与对乙酰氨基酚一起服用作为治疗成人和 12 岁或以上青少年短期牙痛的一线治疗方法(ADA)、匹兹堡大学牙科医学院和宾夕法尼亚大学牙科医学院全球综合口腔健康中心。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/New-guidelines-set-safer-standards-for-dental-pain-relief.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/New-guidelines-set-safer-standards-for-dental-pain-relief.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=4e72252b-d9b9-4794-8086-1124eeff84ab Tue, 06 Feb 2024 13:27:27 -0500 New guidelines set safer standards for dental pain relief
跨学科梦想团队获得 300 万美元资助彻底改变阿尔茨海默病诊断合成化学家、医学影像专家和神经科医生有什么共同点？他们聚集在贝克曼先进科学技术研究所的生物医学成像中心，开发更好的诊断工具和成像剂来检测早期阿尔茨海默病和其他神经退行性疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Interciplin-dream-team-receives-243-million-grant-to-revolutionize-Alzheimers-diagnosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Interciplin-dream-team-receives-243-million-grant-to-revolutionize-Alzheimers-diagnosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=d169dcee-34ce-481a-92b1-1c370554ee30 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 13:20:30 -0500 Interdisciplinary dream team receives $3 million grant to revolutionize Alzheimer's diagnosis
治疗方式影响晚期肺癌患者的感染情况肺部恶性肿瘤是老年患者中最常见和致命的癌症之一。研究表明，肺癌患者下呼吸道感染的发生率较高。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Treatment-modalities-shape-in​​fection-profiles-in-advanced-lung-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Treatment-modalities-shape-in​​fection-profiles-in-advanced-lung-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=96dc247c-db3e-4340-b2b9-62d0442f3e4a Tue, 06 Feb 2024 13:14:32 -0500 Treatment modalities shape infection profiles in advanced lung cancer patients
额外的手指和双心：科学家解读微小的突变如何破坏发育我们的基因组提供了适当生长和发育的指令。数以百万计的基因组开关（称为增强子）控制着基因表达的位置和时间，从而确保我们一生中在正确的时间在正确的细胞中产生正确的蛋白质。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Extra-fingers-and-double-hearts-Scientists-decode-how-tiny-mutations-can-derail-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Extra-fingers-and-double-hearts-Scientists-decode-how-tiny-mutations-can-derail-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ae397de0-78e3-4a6b-91da-e8580f6d5f43 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 13:09:32 -0500 Extra fingers and double hearts: Scientists decode how tiny mutations can derail development
研究揭示了转录因子在早期胚胎发育过程中的作用新的国际研究揭示了转录因子在早期胚胎发育过程中的作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Study-shines-light-on-the-role-of-transcription-factors-during-early-embryonic-development.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240206/Study-shines-light-on-the-role-of-transcription-factors-during-early-embryonic-development.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=38583763-1058-4b6a-973b-ec7d0ea40463 Tue, 06 Feb 2024 13:02:00 -0500 Study shines light on the role of transcription factors during early embryonic development
